name: friskiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of liking to play or being full of activity: She had the friskiness of a kitten. The production has a playful friskiness. See
frisky
More examplesFewer examplesThe article gives tips on how to increase the friskiness in your love life.The horses were roused to friskiness by the impending race.Carla Gugino brings some welcome friskiness to the role.
